name: Snail Race (Bardon)
description:
You are a snail and participate at the "Animal Olympics" on the 100 m sprint. All say to you, that you will be last because you are a snail. But you can break your bounderies. How? The audience throws sometimes flowers, when you eat them you get faster!

Control is with cursor-keys. When you are game over at the end, try again, sometimes the audience throw less flowers, sometimes more!
